body_html: Thanks for the PR, and sorry for the delayed review. Could you please rebase, since the layers have changed recently? I believe the fix is no longer necessary in BN but may be necessary in Bidirectional.

body: Thanks for the PR, and sorry for the delayed review. Could you please rebase, since the layers have changed recently? I believe the fix is no longer necessary in BN but may be necessary in `Bidirectional`.
